key.name: hoover-timeout
key.description: How long the mouse-cursor have to stay over the icon before the tooltip is displayed (in ms).

key.name: label-show-time
key.description: Determines how fast the tooltip should be displayed.

key.name: label-hide-time
key.description: Determines how fast the tooltip should be dismissed.

key.name: allways-show-tooltips
key.description: Shall the tooltip be displayed even if the text is not cut-off/elipsized.

key.name: show-app-description
key.description: Shall the description of the app be displayed under the name (true/false)

key.name: font-size
key.description: How big (in px) the font size of the toltip should be.

key.name: max-width
key.description: How wide (in px) the tooltip text can be before the is gets wrapped.
